passives.name: Inner Flame
passives.effects:
Every 2 rounds, gain a random {{bi|Dragon Soul}}. Additionally, increase your '''total''' {{as|attack damage}}, {{as|ability power}}, {{as|attack speed}}, {{as|'''maximum''' health}}, {{as|armor}}, {{as|magic resistance}}, and {{as|ability haste}} by 4% for each {{bi|Dragon Soul}} you possess, up to {{ap|4*6}}% at maximum souls.

Once you have obtained all 6 {{bi|Dragon Soul|Dragon Souls}}, you also gain the {{bi|Aspect of the Dragon}} buff permanently at the next phase. ''Aspect of the Dragon'' counts as an extra Soul for this effect, for a total stat increase of {{ap|4*7}}%.
